name: Chop the Stuff: Breaking Game
description:
Chop The Stuff is a 3D stuff breaking game with rich visuals and realistic sound effects. You can play it to nail, cut the wood stems, chop the crockery, and smash the stones etc..

You can cut it into small pieces. Chop The Stuff is the free game in arcade games free. In which you have to hammer the nails, cut the wood, break and smash the stones with an axe or a bar.

Tap on screen for a wood hit, ax hit and nail hit. You need to match the timing with the moving stones, nail or wood. When you tap on the screen with exact math than you would be chop, nail or break with success. Otherwise, If you miss the nailing, chopping or wood clicking, you might be a loser.
